title: Eating small amounts of red and processed meats may increase risk of early death

title_detail.value: Eating small amounts of red and processed meats may increase risk of early death

summary: A new study suggests that eating red and processed meats -- even in small amounts -- may increase the risk of death from all causes, especially cardiovascular disease.

summary_detail.value: A new study suggests that eating red and processed meats -- even in small amounts -- may increase the risk of death from all causes, especially cardiovascular disease.
